page.title: 08A Parent's Day In Kirby
page.content:
I get up at approx. 7.20,wash,shave, eat a quick breakfast,and go to my factory.At my factory I organise the men and plan the work for the day.I answer the telephone and speak to customers.Occasionally I will help out on the machines, although I spend most of my time organising the business.I start work at 8.00am, have half an hour for lunch and finish at 6.00pm.Sometimes I have to go on long trips to get work from customers.
When I get home I eat my dinner and then go to the new factory which I am building until 9.00pm.Some days I go weight lifting and play tennis and squash.Some days I take my wife out for a meal. When I get home I have a shower or bath and watch television or listen to some music.
